name: Gold Digger: The Lost Mines
summary: Gold Digger ‘The Lost Mines’ is a multi-level climbing game with a unique balance between strategy and action. You move around an old gold mine, picking up and mining gold with dynamite, while avoiding different adversaries. This game is different and requires more reflex skills than Spacestation Pheta, however “thinkers” will have just as much fun solving the Gold Digger screens! There are 175 built-in screens plus an editor to create your own. Available for Macintosh and Windows.
